text: C C Land Holdings Limited () is engaged in the manufacturing of packaging products and travel bags, and property development, mainly in Chongqing, China.C C Land Holdings LimitedC C Land Holdings Limited The company was formerly known as Qualipak International Holdings Limited. In 2006, its business was transformed to be a property developer through the acquisition of Chongqing Zhongyu Property Development Company Limited. In 2007, it changed its name to C C Land Holdings Limited. In March 2017, CC Land bought London's Leadenhall Building for £1.15 billion. ==References== ==External links== *C C Land Holdings Limited *Chongqing Zhongyu Property Development Co., Ltd Category:Companies listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange Category:Real estate companies of China Category:Privately held companies of China Category:Companies established in 1992 Category:Companies based in Chongqing Category:Manufacturing companies of Hong Kong
title: C C Land
